definitions.definition: A stone coffin , often with its exterior inscribed , or decorated with sculpture .

subdefinitions.definition: The cement and steel structure that encases the destroyed nuclear reactor at the Chernobyl Nuclear Power Plant in Chernobyl , Ukraine .
A type of wine cooler ( “ a piece of equipment used to keep wine chilled ” ) shaped like a sarcophagus (sense 1) .

definitions.definition: A kind of limestone used by the Ancient Greeks for coffins, so called because it was thought to consume the flesh of corpses .

main_definition: A stone coffin , often with its exterior inscribed , or decorated with sculpture .
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete except Ancient Greece , historical ) A kind of limestone used by the Ancient Greeks for coffins, so called because it was thought to consume the flesh of corpses .
